homeHeader.title: Minimise Delays, Maximise Freight Efficiency — Achieve Seamless Growth in RAK Maritime City Free Zone
homeHeader.description: Simplify business launch in Ras Al Khaimah Maritime City with our seasoned business consultants. We do all the legwork, from balancing shipping permits to securing logistics and visa approvals, empowering you to scale stress-free. Position your business at the crossroads of 4 key seaports and gain strategic access to the Arabian Gulf,  Dubai International Airport, and multi-lane highways to streamline global trade.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Who issues a RAK Maritime license?
items.answer: The Ras Al Khaimah Free Zone Authority issues the relevant trade license, empowering you to set up and operate in the Emirates.

items.question: What documents do I need to form a business in RAK Maritime City?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need to select a business activity, register as a legal entity, and secure a valid permit.

items.question: What legal entities can I set up in Ras Al Khaimah Maritime City?
items.answer: RAK Maritime City Free Zone empowers you to select from four forms of registration, including a branch of a foreign company, Free Zone Company, branch of a UAE company, and Free Zone Establishment.

items.question: How long can I lease a warehouse or plot in Ras Al Khaimah Maritime City Free Zone?
items.answer: You can lease plots for a minimum of 25-years and for as long as 99-years, depending on your business activity.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me open a bank account in the RAKMC Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, our expert business consultants connect you with the ideal bank account partner to simplify business finances in RAKMC.
